title: COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 3695/93 of 21 December 1993 allocating, for 1994, certain catch quotas between the Member States for vessels fishing in Faroese waters
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 3695/93 of 21 December 1993 allocating, for 1994, certain catch quotas between the Member States for vessels fishing in Faroese waters
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: From 1 January to 31 December 1994 catches taken by vessels flying the flag of a Member State in the waters falling within the fisheries jurisdiction of the Faroe Islands, under the arrangement on reciprocal fishing rights for 1993 between  the Community and the Faroe Islands, shall not exceed the quotas set out in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1994.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 December 1993.
For the Council
The President
A. BOURGEOIS
(1) OJ No L 389, 31. 12. 1992, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 261, 20. 10. 1993, p. 1.
ANNEX
Allocation of Community catch quotas in Faroese waters for 1994, as referred to in Article 1  "(in tonnes)
